item.title: Send files via minicom
item.description:
Send file

  • Set the file path which you should choose file from

    • Press Ctrl + A , then press O

    • Choose Filenames and paths

item.title: Qt-creator cross-compliation
item.description: 1. Get the cross compiler toolchain Because i am using the processor imx28, so i need to install arm-fsl-linux-gnueabi

item.title: Serial-USB device on Linux
item.description:
Install minicom

sudo aptitude update
sudo aptitude install minicom

Plug the device then check if system recognize the adapter

item.title: Webcam with Linux
item.description:
You want to set up your webcam with Linux, see a video stream from it and learn which applications you can use with it, right? Then this article is for you.

Setup

  • plug in your webcam (typically to USB)

item.title: about
item.description: Github: CountStarlight Email: countstarlight@gmail.com website: couuntstarlight.github.io

item.title: Math Sample
item.description:
KaTeX can be used to generate complex math formulas server-side.

$$ \phi = \frac{(1+\sqrt{5})}{2} = 1.6180339887\cdots $$

Additional details can be found on GitHub or on the Wiki.

item.title: Android's selinux
item.description:
一、适用情景

当在init.rc中新增service：

service ro_isn /system/bin/isn.sh class late_start user root Oneshot

kernel log会打印以下log：

Warning! Service ro_isn needs a SELinux domain defined; please fix!

这是因为Service ro_isn没有在SELinux的监控之下，这种情况会提示你定义一个SELinux。

在这种情况下，你可以：
